name: Suspenders/Bow Tie Set Newborn-12 Months
description:
❤ D e s c r i p t i o n ❤

Diaper Cover Suspenders and Bow Tie Set!! This is customizable in any 2 colors. This set is great for costumes or photography props! Made for Newborn, 3-6, 6-12 Months :)

❤ A b o u t ❤

Eternal Light Shop is a small home business owned by Priscilla Mefford. I am very passionate about the crafts I make. I am very picky with the materials I use. I only use the best quality materials. Most of my products are made with 100% acrylic yarn. I work in a smoke free home! All items are hand crocheted by me. I enjoy crocheting! Love and care within each stitch! Hats, scarves, afghans & More! 10 years experience!

If you would like something different color or size, please convo me. I welcome custom orders.

❤ M e a s u r e m e n t s & M a t e r i a l s ❤

*Made with 100% Acrylic yarn.

*Sizes:
Newborn
Baby 3-6 Months
Baby 6-12 Months

❤ W a s h I n s t r u c t i o n s ❤

* Hand wash in warm, soapy water and lay flat to dry. Reshape!

❤ S h i p p i n g ❤ 

* Priority Mail® Small Flat Rate Box (1-5 business days)
* Priority Mail® International Small Flat Rate Box (6-10 business days)

❤ These are made to order. The average wait time depending on workload will be 2-3 days.

❤ Etsy Page: https://www.etsy.com/listing/106227580/suspendersbow-tie-set-newborn-12-months

❤ Model is Baby Jude Merritt! --> http://www.facebook.com/tonyamm

❤ Not a Facebook fan yet? You should be!! Click here! ---> http://www.facebook.com/EternalLightCandles

❤ Thank you! ❤
